summary: This is a merged plugin of a few of Pink Sky's Final Fantasy clothing!
descriptionHtml:
[center]This is a merged plugin of a few of Pink Sky's Final Fantasy clothing! 

You'll find many of these used in my mods here on the Nexus


Included are 

ffVIII Garden Uniforms <-- male/female
ffVIII Disciplinary Committee Costumes  <-- male/female
ffXII Vaan's Outfit <-- male
ffXII BalfOutfit  <--- male
ffXII Balfear Outfit <--- male
ffX-2 Yuna and Rikku's armor <--- female (not by Pink Sky)

I'll update this pack if there are any problems and I'll be adding more armors in a separate armor pack or you'll probably just be able to find them all in my Final Fantasy Skyrim Mod. 

All of the Armors are for UNP. 

I'll try to make conversions as I can! 


All credit goes to Pink Sky for the time and effort put in to these incredible quality clothing mods! 

(they look great in Aether Suit)
[/center]
author: PinkSky
